mapper.select: SELECT emp_no empNo, emp_name empName, rank_name rankName, dpt_no dptNo FROM emp WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_pw = SHA2(#{empPw},256)
SELECT emp_no empNo, emp_name empName, emp_email empEmail FROM emp WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_email = #{empEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET emp_pw = SHA2(#{empPw},256), pw_update_datetime = NOW() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
UPDATE emp SET contact = #{contact}, post_no = #{postNo}, address = #{address}, emp_pw = SHA2(#{empPw},256), pw_update_datetime = NOW(), signup_YN = 'Y', signup_date = NOW() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_name empName FROM emp WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND signup_YN = 'Y';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp( emp_no, emp_name, emp_state, dpt_no, rank_name, start_date, emp_email ) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{empName}, #{empState}, #{dptNo}, #{rankName}, #{startDate}, #{empEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT emp_email empEmail FROM emp WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT e.emp_no empNo, e.emp_name empName, e.ext_no extNo, e.start_date startDate, e.end_date endDate, e.rank_name rankName, sc.state_code_name empState, sc.state_code empStateCode, g.dpt_name teamName, g.dpt_no teamNo, sg.dpt_name deptName, sg.dpt_no deptNo, ssg.dpt_name officeName, ssg.dpt_no officeNo, i.original_file originalFile, s.approval_sign_file approvalSignFile FROM emp e LEFT JOIN profile_img i ON e.emp_no = i.emp_no LEFT JOIN approval_sign s ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN `group` g ON g.dpt_no = e.dpt_no INNER JOIN `group` sg ON sg.dpt_no = g.superior_dpt_no INNER JOIN `group` ssg ON ssg.dpt_no = sg.superior_dpt_no INNER JOIN state_code sc ON sc.state_code = e.emp_state AND sc.state_cf_code = 'EMP' WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET emp_pw = SHA2(#{newPw},256) WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_pw = SHA2(#{oldPw},256)
UPDATE emp SET emp_email = #{empEmail}, contact = #{contact}, post_no = #{postNo}, address = #{address} WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
